body:
here is the solution that worked for owncloud and more 

thanks to the solution below, from a microsoft technologist, kepler ramanantsoa - http://www.twitter.com/bykepler,  he posted a solution for this kind of problems or bug when uploading a big file on lamp server and more on microsoft solution blog. 

- so this bug is caused by server configuration, for plesk below is his solution, try to find the right files for other distribution (ubuntu, fedora, redhat,...).

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
plesk 11.x - ssh :
httpd.conf of your domain or subdomain : in /var/www/vhosts/yourdomain.net/conf/last_httpd.include

1/- find in the file the line for "fcgidmaxrequestlen" (2 lines) and change the value just aside. 
      the default is 16777216 change it to 1073741824 (1g) or 2147483647 (2g)

       it will look like this : fcgidmaxrequestlen 1073741824

2/- add this line at the end of the script, still last_httpd.include, the path must match to the folder of your owncloud

< directory "/var/www/vhosts/youdomain.net/owncloud/">
    limitrequestbody 2147483647
< /directory>

note : </  and <directory without space, github don't show the code if i write it correctly.

3/- in the php.ini (use plesk domain panel config.) try to use this value to allow upload big files :

memory_limit = 512m
#the maximum amount of memory in bytes a script is allowed to allocate.
max_input_time = 3600
#the maximum time in seconds a script is allowed to parse input data.
max_execution_time = 3600 (1h) 
#the maximum time in seconds a script is allowed to run before it is terminated.
post_max_size = 1200m 
#the maximum size in bytes of data that can be posted with the post method. 
upload_max_filesize = 1024m 
#the maximum size in bytes of an uploaded file.

note : post_max_size > upload_max_filesize
 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

@gnozys thanks man! it solved my problem since many years!
